extendedInfo.description: The only app with up-to-the-minute bus times and route maps for every stop in the UK! From the makers of the country's best-selling travel app comes UK Bus Checker; an app that works at every one of mainland UK's 300,000 bus stops to show you WHEN the buses are coming - and WHERE they're going. Download this free trial today and see what the fuss is about for yourself:â¢ Get Live or scheduled bus times for every stop in the UK. â â¢ Browse detailed and comprehensive bus route maps. â â¢ Real-time information in more than 35 towns/cities â â¢ Android widget - live bus times on your home screen â â¢ Save your favourite bus stops for instant bus times â â¢ Search full UK database of 1.2 million roads, postcodes, towns & cities â â¢ Tap on bus numbers to filter the list: see screenshots. â¢ Many other unique features, all with the same slick interface that made our app 'London Bus Checker' a #1 hit. â â London Bus Checker has been featured on BBC Click, Telegraph Online, The Independent, The Guardian, Wired UK and an App Store 'Staff Favourites' ! â ââ FULL DESCRIPTION ââ Using GPS receivers placed on buses as they travel around, UK Bus Checker is able to provide accurate, real-time bus arrivals information in dozens of towns and cities around the UK. (see www.buschecker.com for full coverage list) And if live data isn't available, Bus Checker is able to display an up-to-the-minute list of scheduled bus arrivals; the best of both worlds! And that's not all - Bus Checker is the first and only app in the UK to provide full bus route maps; ideal for planning a journey around town.   Bus Checker includes these and many more features, along with the great interface that's made its sister app - London Bus Checker - the nation's best selling travel app: ââ PRAISE FOR 'LONDON BUS CHECKER' ââ âIf you regularly ride a bus, then you should not leave home without Buscheckerâ â The Guardian âA simple, well-designed appâ â Daily Telegraph âI'm not surprised this app has leapt to the top of the UK Travel chartsâ â BBC Click One of Cosmopolitan Magazine's featured "Best Apps Ever" - Cosmo UK âââ FREE 7 DAY TRIAL VERSION - DOWNLOAD AND TRY TODAY âââDownload UK Bus Checker today - and never miss that last bus of the night again! Although if you do, we're not shouting you a cab. _____________________________________________ Data provided by official TfL and Traveline feeds _____________________________________________ ââ NOTES ââ - For full list of live coverage areas, see www.buschecker.com - Bus Route Maps use precise locations for bus stops, but the blue line representing roads travelled between them is generated automatically and may occasionally deviate from the actual route taken. As the routing technology improves, your app will update automatically, free of charge. PROBLEMS WITH THE APP? We offer a full support service at www.buschecker.com - and be sure to try uninstalling and re-installing the app too as this cures most general issues with the app. Please do contact us before leaving a bad review - we're here to help!

reviews.title: Very Good app
reviews.comment: Gives a very good estimate of bus times. Would be 5 stars if it can automatically find my location. Some it asks u to enter your location.
reviews.author: stefanos debas

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: I work in the public transport industry and find this very useful. A bit of planning data and real time as well as the next hour+ services would perfect it. Oh, and in Nottinghamshire the text code is wrong, thats the stop id.
reviews.author: Craig Garrard

reviews.title: Not worth buying
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work for Manchester min by min time arrivals not like the London app, Just go on the GMPTE website ora bus companys website to find out times, Its that there LONDON again
reviews.author: David Harrison

reviews.title: Why does it want email
reviews.comment: Was going to buy the fill version and then noticed a trial version. But why does it request email details?   No thanks. Not buying the full version neither.  Stick to Traveline.
reviews.author: Clive Sinclair

reviews.title: Excellent quick
reviews.comment: Used this now many times and it has not let me down. Quick and efficient with now time lag.
reviews.author: Stephen Rodgers

reviews.title: Very reliable
reviews.comment: It\'s great that it shows all the bus stops.
reviews.author: Anselmo Fernandes

reviews.title: A*
reviews.comment: Finaly a reliable app that can give me the times of the local buses.
reviews.author: ian smith

reviews.title: Works good on SGS2
reviews.comment: Had few instances where it wasn\'t accurate, and widget doesn\'t refresh properly but we\'ll worth the money.
reviews.author: Kevin Rhodes

reviews.comment: An excellent guide snd useful tool to be with at all times. Well done snd thanks.\tThanks
reviews.author: Govinda Samy

reviews.title: Eki
reviews.comment: Very accurate
reviews.author: imo Ekimos

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my pad altho other apps do
reviews.author: Mark Edwards

reviews.comment: Would be five stars if ticket prices were available.
reviews.author: Iain Macgregor

reviews.comment: It is easy to use
reviews.author: Michael Conway

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Keeps shutting down every time I try using it.
reviews.author: lorraine macfarlane

reviews.title: helpful
reviews.comment: As good as  other aps such as \'Bus Scout\'
reviews.author: Phil Morgan

reviews.comment: Brilliant and reliable app. The widget is really useful too.
reviews.author: Melly Richards

reviews.title: Ndg
reviews.comment: It\'s really helpful and I\'m enjoying it
reviews.author: koki safiya

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: I live in West Yorkshire and commute daily using buses. On my Nexus 7 this works perfectly and makes travelling around so much easier.
reviews.author: Andy O\'Dwyer

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Excellent app. If only the bus company information was as good as this!
reviews.author: Robert Harness

reviews.comment: Very useful
reviews.author: Danny Evans
